mapper.select: SELECT aa.customerId,aa.apiTypeId,aa.stid,aa.costCount,aa.costUpCount,(aa.costCount-aa.costUpCount) cacheCount, bb.name apiTypeName,cc.name stidName,CONCAT_WS('--',bb.name,cc.name) apiTypeName_stidName FROM ( SELECT a.customerId,a.apiTypeId,a.stid, count(b.id) costCount, count(c.id) costUpCount FROM qyfinance.finance_CustomerRequestLog a INNER JOIN qyfinance.finance_CustomerBalanceLog b ON a.id = b.reqId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiRequestLog c ON a.id = c.customerReqLogId WHERE a.createTime >= #{endDate} GROUP BY a.customerId,a.apiTypeId,a.stid ) aa LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType bb ON aa.apiTypeId = bb.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwMobileOperator cc ON aa.stid = cc.id
SELECT a.customerId,sum(a.costCount) costCount,sum(a.costUpCount) costUpCount FROM qyfinance.CompanyApiTypeConsumeDayCountCache a WHERE a.consuTime >= #{time} GROUP BY a.customerId

SELECT a.customerId,count(b.id) costCount,count(c.id) costUpCount FROM qyfinance.finance_CustomerRequestLog a INNER JOIN qyfinance.finance_CustomerBalanceLog b ON a.id = b.reqId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiRequestLog c ON a.id = c.customerReqLogId WHERE a.createTime >= #{time} GROUP BY a.customerId

SELECT aa.apiTypeId,aa.stid,aa.costCount,aa.costUpCount,(aa.costCount-aa.costUpCount) cacheCount, bb.name apiTypeName,cc.name stidName,CONCAT_WS('--',bb.name,cc.name) apiTypeName_stidName FROM ( SELECT a.apiTypeId,a.stid, count(b.id) costCount, count(c.id) costUpCount FROM qyfinance.finance_CustomerRequestLog a INNER JOIN qyfinance.finance_CustomerBalanceLog b ON a.id = b.reqId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiRequestLog c ON a.id = c.customerReqLogId WHERE a.createTime >= #{time} AND a.customerId = #{customerId} GROUP BY a.apiTypeId,a.stid ) aa LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType bb ON aa.apiTypeId = bb.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwMobileOperator cc ON aa.stid = cc.id WHERE (aa.costCount-aa.costUpCount) > 0
